bibl.title: Euripides Papyri. I: Texts from Oxyrhynchus.
bibl.seg: Donovan Bruce E., Euripides Papyri. I: Texts from Oxyrhynchus. (American Studies in Papyrology. 5.)
New Haven - Toronto, American Society of Papyrologists, 1969, 4°, ix-104 pp. et 23 pll.

C.R. par Giovanni Geraci, Aegyptus 49 (1969) pp. 263-265. - Donald F. Jackson, AJP 93 (1972) pp. 497-499. - Paul Mertens, ChrEg 51 (1976) No. 101, pp. 194-197. - Peter J. Parsons, JEA 59 (1973) pp. 271-272. - Günter Poethke, DLZ 93 (1972) coll. 982-984. - Bruno Snell, Gnomon 43 (1971) p. 814.
